examples.korean: The enemy is using confusion tactics. 발음듣기 적군이 교란작전을 펼치고 있다 Neungyule
examples.english: The enemy is using confusion tactics. 발음

examples.korean: The treatment is taken orally and disrupts the parasites that infect victims of the disease. 발음듣기 이 치료약은 구강 복용하는 것으로 환자를 감염시키는 기생충을 교란한다. Neungyule
examples.english: The treatment is taken orally and disrupts the parasites that infect victims of the disease. 발음

examples.korean: The study tricked the typists' 'higher' system into believing they had made mistakes. 발음듣기 이 연구는 타이피스트들의 '상위' 체계를 교란시켜 자신이 실수한 것처럼 생각하도록 하였다. Neungyule
examples.english: The study tricked the typists' 'higher' system into believing they had made mistakes. 발음

examples.korean: The astronomers said YU55 posed no threat to Earth: it did not disrupt the moon's orbit or Earth's gravity. 발음듣기 천문학자들은 YU55가 지구에 어떤 위협도 가하지 않았다고 말했다.; 달의 궤도나 지구의 중력을 교란시키지 않았다. Neungyule
examples.english: The astronomers said YU55 posed no threat to Earth: it did not disrupt the moon's orbit or Earth's gravity. 발음

examples.korean: They also said a minimum of two ships are necessary for diversionary tactics during hostage rescue missions. 발음듣기 또한 인질 구조 임무를 수행할 시 교란 작전을 위해 최소 두 척의 선박이 필요하다고 말했다. Neungyule
examples.english: They also said a minimum of two ships are necessary for diversionary tactics during hostage rescue missions. 발음
